output



C_OUTPUT_INVALID_HANDLE

#define C_OUTPUT_INVALID_HANDLE C_INVALID_INDEX
type: C preprocessor definition

OutputChannel

type: C enum
description: output channel types
OUTPUT_STANDARD
OUTPUT_ERROR
OUTPUT_WARNING
OUTPUT_DEBUG
OUTPUT_CUSTOM0
OUTPUT_CUSTOM1
OUTPUT_CUSTOM2
OUTPUT_CUSTOM3
OUTPUT_CUSTOM4
OUTPUT_CUSTOM5
OUTPUT_CUSTOM6
OUTPUT_CUSTOM7

output_callback_func

typedef void(*output_callback_func)(int64, OutputChannel, void*, const char*);
type: C typedef
description: output callback function pointer
parameters are
int64 timestamp
OutputChannel channel,
void * output data
const char* message

c_output_channel_string

const char* c_output_channel_string(OutputChannel channel);
type: C function
description: get string version of output channel

c_output_initialize

void c_output_initialize(void);
type: C function
description: initialize core output

c_output_terminate

void c_output_terminate(void);
type: C function
description: terminate core output

c_output_register

uint c_output_register(output_callback_func fct, uint channel_mask, void *data);
type: C function
description: register output source, returns output handle

c_output_release

void c_output_release(uint handle);
type: C function
description: release output source

c_output

void c_output(const char *format, ...);
type: C function
description: output formatted message to OUTPUT_STANDARD channel

c_output_error

void c_output_error(const char *format, ...);
type: C function
description: output formatted message to OUTPUT_ERROR channel

c_output_warning

void c_output_warning(const char *format, ...);
type: C function
description: output formatted message to OUTPUT_WARNING channel

c_output_debug

void c_output_debug(const char *format, ...);
type: C function
description: output formatted message to OUTPUT_DEBUG channel

c_output_custom

void c_output_custom(OutputChannel channel, const char *format, ...);
type: C function
description: output formatted message to channel
